title: Logo-Love
content:
In the same vein as Hrant's "Glyph-Love", I think it would be interesting to see your favorite logo. (Preferably one that you have designed) Or, if you haven't done any logos, one that you consider to be a well designed, solid mark.   
   
I am reading Leslie Carbargas's book now and was impressed with his logo selections!
author: ideagent

comments.content: This includes "client-rejected" logos as well. Since those always seem to be better than the ones they pick!

I have always thought that the NHL Hartford Whalers (currently the Carolina Hurricanes) had the best logo in sports.   
   
 [http://whalers.hart.net/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020172414/http:/whalers.hart.net/)   
   
A pity they moved. The current Hurricanes logo is the worst of any sports team.   
   
 [http://carolinahurricanes.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020172414/http:/carolinahurricanes.com/)
Here's mine: JSA Inc. and Jung|Brannen Inc. are architects working in joint venture. Using the letter
